ModMetaData.name: NewRatkinPlus
ModMetaData.author: Gloomylynx Nukafrog
ModMetaData.description: An updated version of the original Ratkin mod, which adds a rodent-like humanoid race. Small and agile but weak in strength, Ratkins are good at agriculture and mining, but less adept at fighting; however, this disadvantage can be mitigated through research. Not backwards compatible with the old Ratkin mod; Please start a new savegame. Features • Rebalanced race and equipment stats • Ratkin-unique backstories • Ratkin apparel • Ratkin weapons, which have high penetration but lower range and less damage • Ratkin-specific research projects • Ratkin Kingdom faction, who are initially friendly • Rotty Milden storyteller, which triggers fewer major incidents in favor of lots of minor ones; small random events also occur less frequently
